name: the ball pit (gloopo)
description:
description:

after visiting the local mcdongs, you want to play in the play area, however this will be the worst mistake of your life. the ball pit is home to one of the most horrific entities on the face of this earth, and you get to meet him.

controls:

WASD = move

LMB = interact

SPACE = jump

F = flashlight (when you get it)
